itinerary.mapNote: After crossing Cradle Mountain cirque. Dolerite columns. 954m.
King Billy pines. Mt Pelion West views. 744m.

itinerary.route: Pelion to Kia Ora (via Mt Ossa opt.)
itinerary.mapNote: After optional Mt Ossa 1617m summit (Tasmania's highest). 752m.
Descending through temperate rainforest toward Lake St Clair. 762m.
Trail end. Ferry across Lake St Clair to Cynthia Bay. 737m.

waypoints.name: Cradle Mountain
waypoints.note: Iconic dolerite crest above Dove Lake. Tasmania's most recognised peak.

waypoints.name: Mount Ossa
waypoints.note: Highest peak in Tasmania. Optional full-day side trip from Kia Ora.

waypoints.name: Dove Lake
waypoints.note: Glacial lake below Cradle. Boathouse. Most photographed in Tasmania.

waypoints.name: Barn Bluff
waypoints.note: Pyramid dolerite summit visible from day 2 track.

waypoints.name: Lake St Clair
waypoints.note: Australia's deepest lake. Ferry finish point. 167m deep.
